mapper.sql: id, role_name, role_desc, describe, is_deleted, revision, created_by, created_time, updated_by, update_time
mapper.select: select r.* from sys_role r left join sys_role_resource rr on r.id = rr.role_id left join sys_resource res on rr.resource_id = res.id where res.resource_url = #{url} and res.is_deleted = 0
